headline.print_headline: Icahn, Mickelson Are Investigated in US Insider Trading Probe-Source
headline.main: Icahn, Mickelson Are Investigated in US Insider Trading Probe-Source

lead_paragraph: The U.S. Federal Bureau of Investigation and the Securities and Exchange Commission are investigating possible insider trading involving billionaire investor Carl Icahn, golfer Phil Mickelson and Las Vegas gambler William Walters, a source familiar with the matter said.
